p: In particular, large areas of vulnerable regions were detected in Asia, where a large percentage of the Pinus forest has already been damaged by PWD. Comparisons of the areas of vulnerable regions among susceptible Pinus species also indicated that several high-risk species are Asian Pinus species ( Table 2). Management measures aimed at preventing PWN infections have been implemented in Japan, South Korea, and mainland China such as felling and fumigation of dead trees in infested forests, strengthening of quarantine measures, and spraying or trunk injection of chemical agents [ 28, 29]. These measures have reduced PWD spread and damage in some regions [ 13, 28].
